If you are a student in IST and you want to write your dissertation using Latex, this can be a good starting point. This template tries to follow this school's specification that you can get here: * [Dissertation guidelines](http://da.tecnico.ulisboa.pt/files/sites/33/guia-preparacao-dissertacao-13_14_2.pdf)
